content:
There's a new draft resource ExampleScenario that has a property resourceType
http://hl7.org/fhir/2018May/examplescenario-definitions.html#ExampleScenario.instance.resourceType
The .net json serializer is discarding that, as its a special case. Is this going to remain?
(and I should try and fix it)
We can change it if need be, I suppose. What would you rather it be called?
